title: Web-Based Information Evaluation Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic internet research skills and experience utilizing academic resources
context.additional_context: Students must develop the ability to select and evaluate reliable web-based information to perform project-based tasks in the language domain.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze web-based information by applying three or more criteria for evaluating information reliability (e.g., author expertise, source credibility, information currency).
Learners can select reliable information with 80% or higher accuracy on a given topic.
Learners can reflectively review their information evaluation process through peer feedback and propose improvement strategies.

resources: Web Information Samples on Diverse Topics

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
